content:
# detherGateway
Gateway between Front App and the detherContracts.

### Build doc
```
# Run ESDoc.
./node_modules/.bin/esdoc

# View a documentation
open ./docs/index.html
```
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "dethergateway",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Gateway between Front App and the detherContracts.",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register test/*.js --recursive"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/dethertech/detherGateway.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "Dether",
    "ethereum",
    "gateway"
  ],
  "author": "Dether Team",
  "license": "ISC",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/dethertech/detherGateway/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/dethertech/detherGateway#readme",
  "dependencies": {
    "dethercontract": "^1.2.5",
    "dotenv": "^4.0.0",
    "es6-promise": "^4.1.1",
    "ethjs-provider-signer": "^0.1.4",
    "ethjs-signer": "^0.1.1",
    "isomorphic-fetch": "^2.2.1",
    "truffle-contract": "^3.0.0",
    "web3": "^0.19.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-eslint": "^8.0.1",
    "babel-polyfill": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-preset-latest": "^6.24.1",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "chai-as-promised": "^7.1.1",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.2",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.7.2",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^12.0.1",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.7.0",
    "eth-lightwallet": "^2.5.6",
    "mocha": "^3.5.3"
  }
}
